external_database.name: FANTOM5 Human Enhancer Atlas
external_database.description: An atlas of active, in vivo bidirectionally transcribed enhancers across the human body defined using the FANTOM5 panel of tissue and primary cell samples.

preprocess.comment: not really preprocessing but necessary to do it independently

parameters.name: FANTOM5 Human Transcribed Enhancer Atlas: Predefined Enhancers
parameters.description: An atlas of active, in vivo bidirectionally transcribed enhancers across the human body defined using the FANTOM5 panel of tissue and primary cell samples. Identifies more than 40,000 enhancer candidates from over 800 human cell and tissue samples.  Paired data tracks are available for each biosource: enhancers expressed in the sample and possibly others, enhancers positively differentially expressed in a specific sample compared to all others.

parameters.scoreDescription: maximum pooled expression of TCs used to construct each bidirectional loci
